channel.title: Marie Kondo for Drafts
channel.description:
I recently discovered a post by sylumer describing his system for creating a menu for actions. This works something like an Action Group within an Action Group. Using it, I went from chaos to a single, well-organized Action Group comprising 13 menus providing access to nearly 100 different actions.
https://forums.getdrafts.com/t/action-to-pick-from-multiple-actions/10611/3
The improvement in useability is enormous.
